SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tab_role_permission trp JOIN tab_permission tp ON trp.permissionId = tp.id AND tp.code=#{code} AND trp.roleId=#{rid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tab_role_Menu trm JOIN tab_menu tm ON trm.menuId = tm.id AND tm.code=#{code} AND trm.roleId=#{rid}
